creator: NOVA KBM d.d.
descriptionHtml:
Start using mBank@Net in just 1 minute. Join modern mobile banking, If you have Paket Komplet or already Online Banking user , then mBank@Net is free.
A single password for online and mobile banking. Forgot your password? Resetting it is simple.
DESCRIPTION
Safe, easy and fast banking services on your mobile device.
• Access is simple; you can either use your Password + SMS OTP or fingerprint / facial recognition, if supported by your device.
• simplified payments with free-of-charge SMS OTP.
• Easy payment of bills (UPN with QR code) with the ‘Scan and Pay’ feature.
• Apply for a Loan, Overdraft, Cards
• Open Savings Account
• I Transfer/You Transfer (QR code) – simply enter the amount you wish to transfer/accept.
• Search for your closest ATM/branch office, together with contact details.
OTHER FEATURES:
• Top-up your prepaid Visa cards or transfer money to your ‘Varčevalnik’ savings account.
• Check the balance of your accounts, cards, savings accounts, Varčevalnik, deposits and loans.
• Manage the settings of your accounts, cards (e.g. limits) and notifications
• Review received e-invoices, SEPA direct debits.
• Messaging your branch office is now easy and secure (skip emails).
If you are a Nova KBM client and are not using the online or mobile banking service yet, you can register by clicking Not a user yet?


For more information, download mBank@net and see. 🙂
descriptionShort: Mobile bank mBank@Net is a modern banking app of Nova KBM

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Changing accounts display order
- Setting default account for payments
- Faster access to useful content
- Sharing QR code or link for payment request
- Email confirmation

descriptionShort: Mobile bank mBank@Net is a modern banking app of Nova KBM

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Updated account details with the option to set a daily payments limit and rename your account
- A payment receipt in .pdf format is available under payment details (request)
- The loan details data now shows the number of total and remaining instalments and the date of first and last payment. We added overview of loan repayments and the option to make additional repayment
- Updated overview of balance and transactions on investments

title: mBank@Net - #1 SLO mobile bank 2020

creator: NOVA KBM d.d.
descriptionHtml:
You can register to mBank@Net in ONE minute. Then you can also use Bank@Net with same Username and Password.

Still no account with Nova KBM? It takes only 10 minutes to open an account with us without visiting branch – completely digital! Try us 6 months free of charge and with all benefits including usage of online and mobile bank Bank@Net. It's easy! All you need is to download mBank@Net, get your identity card and tax number next to you and follow the steps.

DESCRIPTION 
Safe, easy, and fast banking services on your mobile device.
- Access is simple; you can either use your Password + SMS OTP or fingerprint / facial recognition, if supported by your device.
- If you forget your password, don’t worry. Simply reset it by yourself.
- Easy payment of bills (UPN with QR code) with the ‘Scan and Pay’ feature.
- Just enter amount and send link to your friend to receive money.
- Apply for a Loan, Overdraft, Cards
- Open Savings Account
- Search for your closest ATM/branch office, together with contact details.
- Top-up your prepaid Visa cards or transfer money to your ‘Varčevalnik’ savings account.
- Check the balance of your accounts, cards, savings accounts, Varčevalnik, deposits and loans.
- Manage the settings of your accounts, cards (e.g., limits) and notifications.
- Review received e-invoices, SEPA direct debits.
- and many more….

title: mBank@Net - #1 SLO mobile bank 2020

creator: NOVA KBM d.d.
descriptionHtml:
You can register to mBank@Net in ONE minute. Then you can also use Bank@Net with same Username and Password.

Still no account with Nova KBM? It takes only 10 minutes to open an account with us without visiting branch – completely digital! Try us 6 months free of charge and with all benefits including usage of online and mobile bank Bank@Net. It's easy! All you need is to download mBank@Net, get your identity card and tax number next to you and follow the steps.

DESCRIPTION 
Safe, easy, and fast banking services on your mobile device.
- Access is simple; you can either use your Password + SMS OTP or fingerprint / facial recognition, if supported by your device.
- If you forget your password, don’t worry. Simply reset it by yourself.
- Easy payment of bills (UPN with QR code) with the ‘Scan and Pay’ feature.
- Just enter amount and send link to your friend to receive money.
- Apply for a Loan, Overdraft, Cards
- Open Savings Account
- Search for your closest ATM/branch office, together with contact details.
- Top-up your prepaid Visa cards or transfer money to your ‘Varčevalnik’ savings account.
- Check the balance of your accounts, cards, savings accounts, Varčevalnik, deposits and loans.
- Manage the settings of your accounts, cards (e.g., limits) and notifications.
- Review received e-invoices, SEPA direct debits.
- and many more….
descriptionShort: Mobile bank mBank@Net is a modern banking app of Nova KBM

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- application rebranding
- visual changes on requests
- other minor fixes

title: mBank@Net - #1 SLO mobile bank 2020

- Apply for savings, deposits, bundles, cards, and loans right from our application.
- And many more...

No account with Nova KBM? No problem! It only takes 10 minutes to open your bank account with mBank@Net, without visiting the branch. Try us for 6 months free of charge!

mBank@Net Top features:
- Check all your banking products and services
- View your card number, PIN and CVV - Only bank in Slovenia that displays it in web/mobile!
- Make card limit updates
- Request or send money to your friends with Nakaži mi,
- Scan multiple bills in the row and confirm them all at once
- Apply for savings, deposits, bundles, cards, and loans right from our application.
- And many more...

Why choose mBank@Net?
- Voted #1 mobile banking application in Slovenia.
- We put safety, features, and ease of use above all.
- We listen to our clients and regularly update our application.
descriptionShort: Mobile bank mBank@Net is a modern banking app of Nova KBM

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- update of personal data with passport and new ID card,
- option to receive push notifications,
- other minor bug fixes
